plot: When a social outcast meets a self-animated sock puppet, she must prove to the 'cool kids' that what she saw was real or risk being labeled the weird girl forever.
title: Sarah and the Sock Puppet
plot_es: When a social outcast meets a self-animated sock puppet, she must prove to the 'cool kids' that what she saw was real or risk being labeled the weird girl forever.
plot_en: When a social outcast meets a self-animated sock puppet, she must prove to the 'cool kids' that what she saw was real or risk being labeled the weird girl forever.
